macro.name: LVDCOM_OPTIONS
macro.description: Options that define how the VI is started. Add selected options together to make the final value. 1 - warn if idle, 2 - start if idle, 4 - stop VIs if started on exit, 8 - stop VI on exit. (Default 2)

macro.name: LVDCOM_HOST
macro.description: Host on which the vi is running, blank for localhost (Default '')

macro.name: LVDCOM_PROGID
macro.description: DCOM ProgID, required if connecting to a compiled LabVIEW application (Default '')

macro.name: AREA_HIGH_LIMIT
macro.description: The high area limit of the Nima trough

macro.name: AREA_LOW_LIMIT
macro.description: The low area limit of the Nima trough

macro.name: PRESSURE_HIGH_LIMIT
macro.description: The pressure high limit of the Nima trough

macro.name: PRESSURE_LOW_LIMIT
macro.description: The pressure low limit of the Nima trough

macro.name: SPEED_HIGH_LIMIT
macro.description: The speed high limit of the Nima trough

macro.name: SPEED_LOW_LIMIT
macro.description: The speed low limit of the Nima trough
